wikipedia_page.main: John Henry Coleman (born 3 March 1946) is an English former professional footballer who played as a full-back or as a half-back in the Football League for Mansfield Town and York City, in non-League football for Ilkeston Town, and was on the books of Nottingham Forest without making a league appearance.
